deploymentOption.description: Indicates whether to route deployment traffic behind a load balancer. Valid Values are `WITH_TRAFFIC_CONTROL` or `WITHOUT_TRAFFIC_CONTROL`. Default is `WITHOUT_TRAFFIC_CONTROL`.

deploymentType.description:
Indicates whether to run an in-place deployment or a blue/green deployment. Valid Values are `IN_PLACE` or `BLUE_GREEN`. Default is `IN_PLACE`.

_Only one `deployment_style` is allowed_.
